Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/49th
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 47th, Damen, 51st, and Ashland due to, street blockage near Ashland/49th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 47th, Damen, 51st, and Ashland due to, street blockage near Ashland/49th.

Allow extra travel time.
